description: couple seated at a table with green and white table coverings--man just rising from his chair; another woman in blue dress with white apron stands at right; seated woman holds a white cat; painting and sketch hang on wall in background
medium: Pen and brown ink, watercolor, and white heightening
provenance: [Claude Apcher, London; until 1973; sold, September 5, for $75 to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1973-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Painter and His Wife Just Finishing Their Meal
